title: Walk Forward Overfit Control
content: Use walk-forward validation with rolling window splits. Detect overfit by out-of-sample checks, parameter stability, and cross-regime consistency.

title: Scheduler Heartbeat Observability
content: Scheduler observability requires heartbeat status, per-cycle report files, symbols_failed counters, and alert webhook hooks for degraded cycles.

title: Release Gate Threshold Policy
content: Release gate uses profile policy: dev off, staging optional, prod required. Policy includes cases file path and min precision and min recall thresholds.

title: Rollback Drill Retention
content: Rollback drill should force initial health failure, exercise rollback path, archive drill summary, and apply retention by latest report count.

title: Trade Cost And Execution Model
content: Execution model must include commission, slippage, fee assumptions, and post-trade reconciliation of realized pnl impact.

title: Cross Market Calendar
content: Cross market backtest requires CN and US calendar handling, timezone normalization, and market-specific symbol routing.

title: Strategy Version Compare
content: Strategy lifecycle includes snapshot creation, version compare, and rerun workflow using reproducible parameter schema.

title: Citation Traceability
content: Every recommendation should include citation evidence, reference_id, snippet extraction, and source traceability metadata.

title: Agent Tuning Report
content: Agent tuning output should include quantitative metrics and qualitative suggestions, then propose next strategy version and parameter candidates.

title: Data Gap Backfill
content: Data quality checks focus on timestamp gap detection, missing bars, ingestion replay, and checkpoint-based backfill tracking.

title: Position Sizing Risk Budget
content: Portfolio risk budget controls position sizing by max exposure, drawdown budget, and symbol-level risk caps.

title: Backtest Trade Reconcile
content: Backtest verification checks final_value consistency with terminal equity curve and reconciles trade details including forced liquidation.

title: Governance Profiles
content: Governance profiles strict balanced recall set min_score, max_per_document, and fallback behavior for citation control.

title: YFinance Rate Limits
content: US provider may hit yfinance rate limit. Scheduler and ingestion should record errors and continue idempotent retries.

title: Local Data Backtest Rule
content: Backtest engine must run on local bars only, disable simulated quote mode, and keep reproducible execution outputs.

title: Visual Backtest Report
content: Visual report should include equity curve, drawdown series, trade list, and parameter summary for fast review.

title: Alert Routing
content: Alert routing policy should map scheduler failure severity to webhook channels and include cycle report links.

title: Promotion Decision Rule
content: Promotion requires release gate passed equals true, no blocker checks, and benchmark threshold compliance evidence.
